Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Physics or Chemistry.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
Subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
Subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
Subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects chosen from Government or History, Economics and Geography/Physics.

(ii) NCE merit in Government/History, Economics and Geography/Physics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalent to include English Language, Government/History and three (3) other subjects.
Subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) NCE Social Studies from recognized Colleges.

(ii)           Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language plus two (2) Arts /Social Science subjects.
Subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

Institution Name: TAI SOLARIN COLLEGE OF EDUCATION, IJEBU-ODE, (AFFILITED TO OOU), OGUN STATE
